summary.text:
FEMA Emergency Management Performance Grants Program Reauthorization Act of 2021

This bill extends the authorization of the Emergency Management Performance Grants Program through FY2026. This program provides state, local, tribal, and emergency management agencies with resources to implement the National Preparedness System and otherwise support emergency planning, preparedness, and response.
